response.original_title: The Mountbatten Festival of Music 2024 | The Bands of HM Royal Marines
response.overview: From the comfort of your living room, please join us for the virtual concert broadcast of the Mountbatten Festival of Music 2024 from the Royal Albert Hall, London. Featuring the Massed Bands of His Majesty's Royal Marines, the world-famous Corps of Drums, Iron Maiden's Nicko McBrain, performers from the Royal Edinburgh Military Tattoo and members of the Invictus Games Team UK amongst others, watch as one of the best military bands in the world comes to life. An exciting programme of music awaits including Top Gun, MGM movie classics, Dave Brubeck, Iron Maiden and Earth, Wind & Fire, there truly is something for everyone!
response.title: The Mountbatten Festival of Music 2024 | The Bands of HM Royal Marines
